column2: I enjoyed everything I ate. My only gripe in terms of the food is portion size (again) I know
column3: but this time of the sides. I know the focus is on the meat
column4: in my case - baby back and st. louis ribs
column5: but I do wish that some of the sides (Mac 'N Cheese
column6: Baked Beans) were a little (a lot) larger. I don't know that if you order them separately instead of as part of a platter if they'll be any larger
column7: but the side orders that come with a platter are definitely not sized to share. The only exception to this is the bag of their steak cut fries
